content:
CS 165 - Project in Algorithms and Data Structures

TTh 11:00am-12:20pm, ICS 174

Professor: Michael T. Goodrich, DBH 4091
Office hours: TTh 3:30-4:30pm, DBH 4091 (shared)

TA: Robert Gevorkyan

Grader: Marco (Zhanhang) Liang

  • Announcement(s):

    • Since this is a laboratory course, there is no final exam, as per University policy.

  • Course Syllabus.

  • Projects.

  • Course Notes.

  • Reading Schedule:

    • Week 1: McGeoch, chapters 1-2.
    • Week 2: McGeoch, chapter 3.
    • Week 3: McGeoch, chapter 4.
    • Week 4: A Theoretician's Guide to the Experimental Analysis of Algorithms, by David Johnson
    • Week 5: McGeoch, chapter 5.
    • Week 6: McGeoch, chapter 6.
    • Week 7: McGeoch, chapter 7.
    • Week 8: Efficient generation of large random networks, by Batagelj and Brandes.
    • Week 9: Review online notes.
    • Week 10: Review online notes.


Michael T. Goodrich
Department of Computer Science
University of California, Irvine, CA 92697-3435 USA
